title: Meet Milo, the virtual boy
description: Peter Molyneux demos Milo, a hotly anticipated video game for Microsoft's Kinect controller. Perceptive and impressionable like a real 11-year-old, the virtual boy watches, listens and learns -- recognizing and responding to you.
author: Peter Molyneux
keywords: TED, talks, AI, children, computers, design, gaming, psychology, technology
